participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was about a first serious discussion about the design of the tv remote control.
First the UID has to propose his idea about the design.
The ID had to give his toughts about the best electronic components and the ME give a first bench of marketing studies.

participant_actions.sent: Design new user interface for UID.
Design new electronic sytem for ID.

participant_decisions.sent: The decisions are: - a fancy design of the remote control with the logo and color of the Company an very efficient electronic design.

participant_problems.sent: Wireless or not wireless remote control?
